name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FiniteScroll - Limit infinite scrolling on social media

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Limits infinite scroll feature of social media websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of endless scrolling on social media? FiniteScroll is here to help! This Chrome extension allows you to set a limit on the number of posts, reels, or tikToks you see per day or per refresh. Take control of your time and enjoy a healthier, more balanced online experience.

Features:

Customizable Limits: Choose how many posts or videos you want to see. also you can decide how often the limit appliesâ€”per day, per week, etc. 

Example: Limit facebook feed to only show 10 posts per day
 
Easy to Use: Simple interface to set your preferences.
Supports Multiple Platforms: Works with popular social media sites.
Stay Focused: Reduce distractions and improve productivity.
